snippet: The upcoming Broadway revival of “The Heiress” has found its Catherine Sloper: Jessica Chastain, who received critical acclaim for film performances last year.
abstract: The upcoming Broadway revival of “The Heiress” has found its Catherine Sloper: Jessica Chastain, who received critical acclaim for film performances last year.

headline.main: Jessica Chastain to Star in 'The Heiress' on Broadway
headline.print_headline: Jessica Chastain to Star In ‘The Heiress’ on Broadway
